    • Bus

      public Bus(String name, int size, int price, int lev, Ministry mny)
      Create a new general purpose bus
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the bus
      size - The capacity of the bus
      price - The price to take the bus
      lev - The comfort level of the bus
      mny - The ministry controlling the bus
